description:
Chise shares a meal with her new classmates, but several teachers and students at the College have their eyes on both her and Elias for reasons yet unknown. Chise and Elias head home for the weekend and Stella drops by for a visit.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Birds of a Feather Flock Together. II
